<S%G3004><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Parable : <S%G3850><s%> A Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> A Certain Man <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G290><s%> His Vineyard <S%G846><s%> Planted; <S%G5452><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Came <S%G2064><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Find Any. <S%G2147><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vinedresser, <S%G289><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> I Come <S%G2064><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4808><s%> This Fig Tree <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Do Not Find Any : <S%G2147><s%> Cut Down <S%G1581><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G2444><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> Does It Render Useless? <S%G2673><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler Of The Synagogue <S%G752><s%> Indignant <S%G23><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Healed <S%G2323><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Six <S%G1803><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> There Are, <S%G1526><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> It Behooves Men <S%G1163><s%> To Work; <S%G2038><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Be Healed, <S%G2323><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Killest <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Stonest <S%G3036><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Her, <S%G846><s%> How Often <S%G4212><s%> Would I 2309 V-AAI-1S Have Gathered 1996 V-AAN 3588 T-APN 5043 N-APN 4675 P-2GS Thy Children, 3739 R-ASM In The Way 5158 N-ASM A Hen Gathers 3733 N-NSM 3588 T-ASF Her 1438 F-3GSF Brood 3555 N-ASF Under Her 5259 PREP 3588 T-APF Wings, 4420 N-APF And 2532 CONJ 3756 PRT-N Ye Would Not. 2309 V-AAI-2P
